build(PolyMeshField, OpenHeightfield) - Method in class org.critterai.nmgen.DetailMeshBuilder
Concerning sampling: Sampling functionality will only work correctly if the y-values in the source mesh are accurate to within BoundedField.cellHeight() of an associated span within the provided height field.
